message: From A List Apart about designing registration forms with kids in mind: http://www.alistapart.com/articles/designing-web-registration-forms-for-kids/

Just read that yesterday :) At the bottom was a link to an article in Smashing Magazine - http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2009/11/27/designing-websites-for-kids-trends-and-best-practices/ . I wasn't really in love with the examples they gave for some of these things - some of the "kid sites" seemed much more aimed at parents. And some of the sites had some difficult navigation - at least I thought so.
